Legacy

ESA Space Solutions Portugal at Instituto Pedro Nunes

The Centro+ incubator builds on the work of the ESA Space Solutions Portugal programme, which delivered ESA-backed incubation at IPN between 2014 and 2025. This legacy page preserves the verified milestones, recorded successes, and alumni testimonials from that era so new teams can understand the continuity of support.

Verified achievements

The previous programme emphasised rapid prototyping, investor readiness, and operational testing in both orbit and terrestrial applications. Highlights we will preserve include:

  • Twice-yearly cohorts that received ESA grants alongside Portuguese matching funding.
  • Close coordination with IPN labs to mature sensor, robotics, and lunar communications experiments.
  • Structured mentorship from ESA technical officers plus business leads in Coimbra's innovation ecosystem.

Alumni spotlight

Centro+ sustains the alumni network seeded by ESA Space Solutions Portugal. The list below records the founding teams that graduated with sustained partnership opportunities and follow-on contracts.

  1. Almeida Systems – autonomous inspection satellites for civil infrastructure.
  2. Coimbra Orbital Analytics – Earth observation intelligence with Portuguese agritech trials.
  3. IPN Robotics Lab – modular robotics platforms for lunar habitats (joint venture with a national SME).

More achievements and alumni will be added once the historical dossier is finalized; please check back for the full catalogue of ESA Space Solutions Portugal graduates.
